description.value: Contractor / installer involve in project design, installation and commissioning work. They are the key stakeholder to choose the product, brand and also the party to purchase the product to fulfil the project specification and schedule.

Product manager leads and manage the Plurio NPD which identified the market’s needs, defined the product spec, price and position. PM works with the plant such as PMO on product design, development, launch and product management. Product manager also ensure portfolio fitness, reduce product complexity, assist sales to drive business growth and increase market share based on strategy 2030.
Lighting designer involve lighting design and approval work in project which is the key entrance for spec-in work.

attributes.title: heat water  from an initial temperature of 13°C  +15°C/- 10°C to the selected  brewing temperature within 1 minute.

description.value: The coffee maker shall heat water from an initial temperature of 13°C +15°C/- 10°C to the selected brewing temperature within 1 minute

acceptanceCriteria.value: less than 1 min to heat water

rationale.value: Values are consistent with tap water temperature ranges.

attributes.verification_criteria: coffee brewed at the correct temperature in a time less or equal to 1min

errors.title: Internal Server Error
errors.detail: Omitted field(s) with incompatible value: ext_int.

description.value:
1. User inserts cup to receive coffee
2. User selects the desired brew temperature
3. Machine brews coffee to the container
4. Upon brew completion, the user removes the receiving container

attributes.title: have 3 selectable settings for coffee brewing : Warm, Hot, Extra Hot

description.value: The coffee maker shall have three selectable settings for coffee brewing: Warm (96°C), Hot (100°C), Extra Hot (105°).

acceptanceCriteria.value:
Water must be +/- 2degrees C, of the selected temperature setting listed below, after the operator selects one of the temperature settings:
Warm: 96°C,
Hot: 100°C
Extra Hot: 105°C.

rationale.value: Values are resulting from analysis associated with consumer research surveys and safety regulations.

attributes.verification_criteria: Water must be +/- 2degrees C, of the selected temperature setting

errors.title: Internal Server Error

attributes.title: End-user

description.value: End-users such as local authorities, owners and key tenants involve in project design stage to raise out their needs and expectations. Local authorities can also be the project manager, designer and consultant in a public project.

attributes.lifecycle: concept, development, planning, operation, maintenance, refurbishment

Global NPR Purchasing team involves negotiation work with 3rd party product designer such as Design Office in Plurio NPD.
test

Design Office was the 3rd product designer for existing Plurio with on-going royalty contract signed with Thorn. PM, R&D, Global Non-Product Related (NPR) Purchasing have reached Design Office for Plurio NG.

Sales provides sales service and technical support to customers such as end-users, specifiers and contractors offering professional and sustainable lighting solutions and developing long-term relationships, in result to drive business growth.

Description: Dark Sky is a internation organisation provide leadership, tools, and resources for individuals, policymakers, and industry, in order to reduce light pollution and promote responsible outdoor lighting that is beautiful, healthy, and functional. Product will be recognised by Dark Sky with approval seal and IDA certification if strict requirements have been achieved.
Project Management Office in the plant which is the key driver in the project development involving product R&D and product management.
Sustainability team defines and drives the strategy on sustainability within the organisation on the group level.
Purchasing team handles parts procurement including sourcing and costing during R&D development process
Architect involve design plan and approval work at architectural side in project which is the key entrance for spec-in work.
The electrician is installing and connecting lighting fixtures to ensure proper functionality and safety.
Testing laboratories are verifying luminaire performance and safety.
They ensure proper functioning and address issues during the luminaire’s operational life.
Regulatory Agencies set standards and regulations for luminaire safety and efficiency.

Experienced austrian electrician which is focusing on the installation and maintenance of luminaires in mountains chalets and hotels in Austria. He has been part of refurbishment projects where he installed Zumtobel Brand luminaires in the past.
